top-page.title: Manage Your Rental With Ease
top-page.desc: Simplify property management with Rentorr, the ultimate tenant management app that automates admin and makes it easy to manage your tenants. It has never been easier to be a landlord than with our landlord property management software.

image-info-one.title: Comprehensive Screening Reports
image-info-one.desc: Make smarter decisions with our comprehensive tenant screening reports.

item.title: Credit Reports and History
item.text: With our landlord management software, you will be able to eliminate unqualified applicants easily. See their credit score and public financial records to help make smarter decisions.

item.title: Employment history
item.text: With our tenant application screening software, you will even be able to check employment histories, so that only tenants with a stable income can be chosen.

item.title: Affordability Score
item.text: In these tough time it's important to consider the long term affordability of a rental. We use clever math to help determine an affordability range to protect both the tenant and landlord

text.desc: Make it easy to collect rent by using our tenant management software. Payments will be facilitated to you, through us, so you don’t need to chase after late payments.

text-start.title: Automated Late Fee Rent Collection
text-start.text:
With automated rent, the chances of missed deadlines will be slim, but our tenant management services also include 
an automated late fee invoice to recoup 
the cost.

text-center.title: Flexible Rent Collection
text-center.text:
With hassle-free rent payment through 
our tenant management system, you can enjoy truly flexible rent collection. No need to make house calls – payments are made 
automatically online.

text-end.title: Effortless Cash Flow
text-end.text: Get real-time payments and updates from your tenants to know the status of rent for each individual tenant

image-info-two.title:
List And Manage 
Your Property
image-info-two.desc: Rentorr helps with every step of the renting process, including creating high-quality listings for your property. List, manage and assess your cash flow in real-time with the property management system, Rentorr.

item.title: Create Beutifull Listings
item.text: With our property management system, you will be able to create beautiful listings that attract the best tenants to your property. Create stunning photo galleries, add floorplans, and so much more to make your listing a top choice for renters.

item.title: Online Rental Applications
item.text: Let potential tenants apply to your listing directly and then compare them within our property management portal.

item.title: Easy and Seamless Communication
item.text: Manage all your properties in one place and connect with Tenants real-time irrespective of where you are. Get alerts of maintenance requests and emergencies anywhere you are

image-info-three.title: Scalable & Flexible Property Management
image-info-three.desc: Our services are perfect for individual landlords or property management companies, as it automates many tasks and makes managing a property a cinch.

item.title: List every available property
item.text: Every detail about your property — from features and amenities, to photos and price — are saved in your account

item.title: Save time – do more
item.text: Use your analytics for running a successful business. Receive notifications and respond to messages on time

item.title:
Get rapid insights from 
your dashboards.
item.text: Use real-time dashboards to get a quick overview of important metrics. Track tenant complaint status, vacant properties, rent received and much more

relax.title: Ready to start landing great tenants?
relax.desc: Relax, Find Your Tenant, and watch the rent come in every month.

item-1.how-work-span: Provide your property details filling one page applicataion to let perfect tenant to find you
Promote your listings  to left your competitors behind — always find the best tenants first
Check credit story, employment verification and validate financial statement to minimize financial risk

item-2.how-work-span: Best tennants will match with your perfect property to connect and cooperate for mutual benefit
Do not mess with paper documents — resign contracts in just a couple of clicks
It’s a life, situations happens, but Rentorr will help you communicate through those in flying colors
